componentInstanceProperties.name: bannerTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: A Guide to VentureCrowd's Investor Hub

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Imagine you’ve just inherited a large sum of money from your elderly aunt. You know you want to invest in something other than stocks, but you have no idea what path to take. How do you invest wisely, and where do you even start? 

It’s a common problem many people face when they come into money, and more and more are facing this with the great intergenerational transfer of wealth well underway, but it’s not just new investors who need guidance and support with their investment journeys. Even if you’re a pro investor, you still need to stay on top of the markets, verticals and trends in this rapidly changing world. 

That’s why we’ve created the VentureCrowd Investor Hub, to offer a beacon of clarity in the complex world of investments. Designed as an essential tool for both budding and seasoned investors, the Investor Hub provides comprehensive resources to understand the nuts and bolts of investing, industry verticals and market trends, particularly as they relate to equity crowdfunding and alternative assets.

Whether you're taking your first steps in investment or looking to deepen your understanding of advanced strategies, the Investor Hub is your go-to resource. 

In this blog post, we'll explore how the Investor Hub can enlighten you on the essentials of investing, and guide you in leveraging VentureCrowd's platform to its fullest potential.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
When you’re diving into the world of alternative assets for the first time, it can be rather daunting. Investing in startups looks a lot different to investing in the stock market. For a start, there are no returns until there’s an exit event and the risk: reward ratio is often much higher than what it would be with public stocks. With investing, knowledge is empowerment. The more you know, the less likely you are to make costly mistakes. 

For new investors, the Investor Hub offers a wealth of information about investing in general as well as investing in alternative assets. 

We cover topics such as: 

  • Why invest?
  • Investing 101: What you need to know before you start
  • How to get started with investing
  • What are securities?
  • What is equity crowdfunding?
  • What kind of investor are you? 
  • What are the typical capital-raising stages a company goes through? 
  • How to diversify your portfolio as a new investor
  • How do you make a return on your investments with alternative assets?
  • Your ultimate guide to impact investing verticals, and more


General investing articles cover the different types of investing. They help you understand what you can and cannot invest in depending on what kind of investor you are and give you an understanding of how fractional startup and property investing work.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Understanding how to use VentureCrowd’s platform

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The second layer of articles within the Investor Hub addresses topics specific to using VentureCrowd’s platform. 

Here you can learn about:

  • How to invest via VentureCrowd
  • How to transfer money after you invest on VentureCrowd
  • Understanding investor updates
  • Understanding different deal types at VentureCrowd
  • What can you invest in via VentureCrowd?
  • Our due diligence process for ventures
  • When do you receive units of owners and how?
  • VentureCrowd’s fee structure laid out
  • Unlocking the benefits of a nominee structure for investors and startups, and more


We are adding new articles to the Investor Hub all the time, so if there’s a VentureCrowd platform-related topic you would like more information on, be sure to let us know.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Understanding industries and verticals, trends and markets

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
If you’re an investor who wants more in-depth information about markets, trends and verticals, we’ve got you covered too. 

Dive into articles such as: 

  • 2024: A year to connect climate, health and wealth
  • The new investors: what they want In a digital world
  • How to become a pre-approved investor
  • How to assess the market opportunity of a niche or emerging industry
  • How investing has changed in the last 10 years
  • The profitability of impact investing: why companies focused on social and environmental good are winning
  • Navigating volatile markets: Strategies for high net worth individuals to protect their wealth
  • How AI is being used for impact
  • What is SaaS?
  • How fixed income products can provide an alternative worth considering during market downturns, and more.


Aside from these, we also have stories about inspirational investors, news on our startups’ milestones and recaps of our live webinars with founders. You can find these and more in the Investor Hub and also on our blog.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: What else would you like to see in the Investor Hub?

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: If there’s a topic you’d like covered in the Investor Hub, reach out to us. We’d love to hear your ideas and we want to make this a comprehensive resource for all investors. You can contact the team at hello@venturecrowd.com.au. And if you want to talk to one of our team members about investing at VentureCrowd, book a call today.

componentInstanceProperties.name: description
componentInstanceProperties.value: Whether you’re a beginner or a professional investor, navigate the world of investing via VentureCrowd’s Investor Hub.
